Uses of Package
de.lessvoid.nifty.spi

  • Packages that use de.lessvoid.nifty.spi 
    Package Description
    de.lessvoid.nifty
    Provides the public classes for Nifty representing the public Nifty API.
    de.lessvoid.nifty.spi
    The Nifty Service Provider Interface (SPI) Package.
    de.lessvoid.nifty.time
    The standard implementations of Niftys TimeProvider interface.
  • Classes in de.lessvoid.nifty.spi used by de.lessvoid.nifty 
    Class and Description
    NiftyInputDevice
    Interface for Niftys InputSystem.
    NiftyRenderDevice
    NiftyRenderDevice is part of the SPI that allows Nifty to use different graphics backends.
    TimeProvider
    The time provider interface provides Nifty with the current time as the name suggests.
  • Classes in de.lessvoid.nifty.spi used by de.lessvoid.nifty.spi 
    Class and Description
    NiftyRenderDevice.ColorStop
    When rendering renderLinearGradientQuads() the NiftyRenderDevice implementation gets a list of ColorStop instances.
    NiftyRenderDevice.FilterMode
    The type of filtering to use when loading a texture (Actually this is the filtering mode of the texture after it has been loaded.
    NiftyRenderDevice.PreMultipliedAlphaMode
    Specifies if loaded texture data already is pre-multiplied or if Nifty should pre-multiply it when loading.
    NiftyTexture
    A NiftyTexture is a handle to a texture surface.
  • Classes in de.lessvoid.nifty.spi used by de.lessvoid.nifty.time 
    Class and Description
    TimeProvider
    The time provider interface provides Nifty with the current time as the name suggests.
